item.title: Upgrading MongoDB Overview
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Upgrading MongoDB version Overview This guide will give you an overview on how KubeDB Enterprise operator upgrade the version of MongoDB database. Before You Begin You should be familiar with the following KubeDB concepts: MongoDB MongoDBOpsRequest How Upgrade Process Works The following diagram shows how KubeDB Enterprise operator used to upgrade the version of MongoDB.

item.title: Upgrading MongoDB Replicaset
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Upgrade version of MongoDB ReplicaSet This guide will show you how to use KubeDB Enterprise operator to upgrade the version of MongoDB ReplicaSet. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
